statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -17 \\ -16 \\ -14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -23 \\ -16 \\ -18 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
